notice.text: If you want to have the tasks support additional statuses outside of the default ones add them here with the status indicator.
notice.html:
By default the following statuses are supported:
  • - [ ] Todo - This has a {space} between the brackets. Will toggle to Done.
  • - [/] In Progress - This has a {/} between the brackets. Will toggle to Done.
  • - [x] Done - This has a {x} between the brackets. Will toggle to Todo.
  • - [-] Cancelled - This has a {-} between the brackets. Will toggle to Todo.
